entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 12:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: WSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12 except minus 17 inland.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12 except minus 17 inland. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near midnight. Fog patches overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
